title.rendered: Gym Sports T-Shirt, Workout & Sports Top

content.rendered:
Product details

Material Composition
95% Polyester, 5% Elastane
Care Instructions
Machine Wash
Closure Type
Pull On
Neck Style
Crew Neck

About this item

  • BREATHABLE & QUICK DRY: Our technical, short sleeve t-shirts have a regular fit, a tag-free crew neck to prevent irritations as well as silk like fabric and and side mesh panels to keep you cool during workouts. The lightweight and friction reducing material keeps you comfortable and at ease during your sports activities
  • THE SUSTAINABLE CHOICE FOR YOUR WORKOUT: Our men’s Sustain sports t-shirts are made of recycled materials and use between 7 to 10 recycled plastic bottles. The t-shirts are made of OEKO-TEX Standard 100, GRS and BlueSign certified materials – to exercise comfortably and sustainably
  • IDEAL FOR WORKOUTS & SPORTS: Our moisture-wicking t-shirts for men ensure great freedom of movement and are perfect for all sports activities, such as running, fitness, gym. Available in sizes S, M, L, XL, XXL. Please refer to the size chart on the side image before ordering
  • RECOMMENDED BY OLYMPIC ATHLETES: All our products are tested and developed with Olympic Athletes to ensure the highest standards of performance and material endurance
  • EXCELLENT CUSTOMER SUPPORT: We want our customers to be happy – In case you have any questions or issues, do not hesitate to contact us. Our customer service team is always ready to help you and find the best solution for you
